Research indicating transmission of spec: 2. University of Louisville press release stating that cavities are contagious, without providing a link to any particular research.
Testimony from Liliana Rozo: D.D.S., assistant professor at the University of Louisville School of Dentistry, highlighting the detrimental effects of tooth decay on a child's quality of life, school performance, and overall success.
Reports from dental experts: such as Dr. Irwin Smigel, suggesting that cavities can be transmitted through activities like feeding and kissing between intimate partners, as well as studies showing the presence of cavity-causing bacteria in infants and young children.
